CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(Risk_Level_Business_Type__c = "Risky", VALUE(Number_of_Years_at_Location__c) >= 2, VALUE(Number_of_Years_in_Business__c) >= 3), "Qualified", IF(AND(Risk_Level_Business_Type__c = "Not Risky", VALUE(Number_of_Years_at_Location__c) >= 2, VALUE(Number_of_Years_in_Business__c) >= 1), "Qualified",
"Disqualified" ))
CustomField.label: Qualified Business?
